content.text:
# San Francisco Film Critics Circle Awards 2005

4th SFFCC Awards
December 12, 2005
----
Best Picture:
Brokeback Mountain
The 4th San Francisco Film Critics Circle Awards, honoring the best in film for 2005, were given on 12 December 2005.
Winners
, Best Director winner]]
, Best Actor winner]]
, Best Actress winner]]
, Best Supporting Actor winner]]
, Best Supporting Actress winner]]
*Best Picture:
**Brokeback Mountain
*Best Director:
**Ang Lee - Brokeback Mountain
*Best Screenplay:
**Good Night, and Good Luck. - George Clooney and Grant Heslov
*Best Actor:
**Heath Ledger - Brokeback Mountain
*Best Actress:
**Reese Witherspoon - Walk the Line
*Best Supporting Actor:
**Kevin Costner - The Upside of Anger
*Best Supporting Actress:
**Amy Adams - Junebug
*Best Foreign Language Film:
**Caché • France/Austria/Germany/Italy/United States
*Best Documentary:
**Grizzly Man
*Marlon Riggs Award (for courage & vision in the Bay Area film community):
**Jenni Olson - The Joy of Life
External links
* [http://sffcc.org/main/2005/12/2005-san-francisco-film-critics-circle-awards/ 2005 San Francisco Film Critics Circle Awards]
